user1: People who want to keep a record of their daily efforts such as language learning, diet, muscle training, etc. to encourage them.
user2: Children who want to record their help and study results and check with their parents.
user3: People who want to record and check whether they have taken medicines.
explain1: Open the stamp tab and press the add stamp button on the top right.
explain2: Select an emoji you want to make into a stamp, input the summary, and press the Add button.
explain3: Tap to select the day you want to record, then press the stamp button at the top right.
explain4: Find and select the desired stamp from the stamp list.
explain5: If you press and hold the recorded stamp, a context menu will open, and you can remove the stamp by selecting it.
question1: I would like the calendar week to start from Monday instead of Sunday.
answer1: You can select the start of the week from the settings tab.
question2: I want to sync recordings between my iPhone and iPad.
answer2: If the Apple ID signed in to the device is the same, StampReord records will be automatically synchronized using iCloud.
